mdRecord.dcterms:description: ... built for the former Søllerød Municipality which in 2007 became part of Rudersdal Municipality, combining Søllerød and Birkerød. The building is located in Holte some 19 km to the north of Copenhagen's city centre. ... An extension, completed in 1964 and also designed by Jacobsen, contains three floors of offices. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/S%C3%B8ller%C3%B8d_Town_Hall [work]
